body_text: nit: seeing this now, it looks kinda weird as a static property to have it all caps. I think statusStyles is the way to go unless you're pulling this out into a constant.
body: nit: seeing this now, it looks kinda weird as a static property to have it all caps. I think `statusStyles` is the way to go unless you're pulling this out into a constant.
